description: This file defines a Flask route for health checking, using Flask-Smorest Blueprint and MethodView to create an endpoint that returns a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class that handles GET requests for health status.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests, returning a JSON message indicating server health.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
